intro: An adventure game where you'll play as mouse-vikings who fight for honor, fame and survival.
description:
Explore the world inspired by Norse mythology, meet with gods and warlocks and seize the glory of the fiercest mouse-warrior in this action-packed saga!
Features:
- Epic saga of trust, betrayal, bravery and cute little animals.
- Short story of furry Norse heroes.
- One-evening experience of heroism and mystery!
- Capricious Gods and eldritch magic.
- Choose wisely for even mouse's choice matters!
- Furious battles and cunning tactical challenges.
- Protect your village and kin - but watch out for dark conspiracies!
- Become the hero people want you to be - even if it is mice-people.
- Enjoy art created with love for mice and norse myths.
